item.title: Where Trump Won: The Rust Belt
item.description: At the county level, Donald Trump’s victory doesn’t look like a rebellion against the cities and suburbs.

item.title: Mass Deportation Is an Appropriate Response to Mass Illegal Immigration
item.description: And unlike Trump’s enemies, the public doesn’t fear enforcement of laws that have been systematically ignored for much too long.

item.title: It Is Time for One Agency to Enforce Antitrust
item.description: The Department of Justice should have sole authority, not share it with the FTC.

item.title: Assisted Suicide Would Be Far from Painless in the U.K.
item.description: It should heed the lessons from other countries where state-backed death has been legalized, recognizing the devastating consequences that follow.

item.title: Life of a Reaganaut, &c.
item.description: On Richard V. Allen, South Korea, Iran, China, internal Senate elections, golf lingo, and more.
